name: SHOOTOFF
description:
Spotty is being hunted down by angry red dots, stay alive by shooting them.

ITS EITHER YOU OR THE ENEMY!!!

CAN YOU SURVIVE!!!

___________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY?

Use the arrow keys or the WASD keys to move the player.

Left click on your mouse  to shoot the enemy.

Press the ESC key to pause the game.

(If you are in fullscreen mode while playing , double tap ESC to pause the game, as the first tap exits you from fullscreen mode, the second tap pauses the game)

(If your shot does not hit the enemy, it turns into an enemy, talk about backstab)

___________________________________________________________

ATTRIBUTIONS:

Music: rezoner (https://opengameart.org/content/puzzle-tune-1)

___________________________________________________________

HOW DOES THIS FIT THE THEME???

Well the music says it all.

___________________________________________________________

NOTE FROM THE DEVELOPER:

Thank you so much for playing my game, this is my third game jam and am really excited. Please leave a comment and rate the game please, feedback is also welcomed.
